text: @realDonaldTrump You accuse the Dems of politicising coronavirus (which you couldn’t even spell right the other day) and then try and blame it on their immigration policies. Utter hypocrite. And do you honestly think the American people are so stupid as to believe that utter bullsh*t?

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
